snippet: One man has been arrested on suspicion of opening fire into a crowd outside a taco shop during a gang brawl on Monday.
lead_paragraph: One man has been arrested on suspicion of opening fire into a crowd outside a taco shop during a gang brawl on Monday.

headline.main: California: Suspect Held After 7 in Crowd Are Shot
headline.print_headline: California: Suspect Held After 7 In Crowd Are Shot
